RelatedSentence: NEW YORK - The London imam Abu Hamza al - Masri was convicted of terrorism charges in New York on Monday , following a four - week trial that shined a spotlight on the preacher 's controversial anti-Western statements .

A jury of eight men and four women found Abu Hamza , 56 , guilty on all 11 counts he faced , handing Manhattan US Attorney Preet Bharara his second high - profile terrorism conviction in three months .

A0: The London imam Abu Hamza al-Masri

RelatedSentence: A jury of eight men and four women found Abu Hamza , 56 , guilty on all 11 counts he faced , handing Manhattan US Attorney Preet Bharara his second high - profile terrorism conviction in three months .
The defendant could face life in prison .
In March , a different jury found Osama bin Laden 's son-in-law Suleiman Abu Ghaith guilty of terrorism - related charges .
